column5: It's a very nice show in a great facility. If anyone's in the area, I highly recommend stopping by! Many great resorts are here, along with many other vendors.
We'll be heading up there Saturday. Too bad they cut it down to 5 days.
Yeah, all the shows have been cut back. I think the big Indy show is the last of the 10 day shows. Problem was, there were no crowds monday-thursday... but, this show has had excellent attendance.
Stopped by your booth looking to chat, but it was empty.

Man, sorry I missed you! I had to take my dog for a walk a couple of times yesterday. At this show, I was the only one in the booth, and 11 hours is difficult to not stretch the legs. Anyhow, I appologize for not being there. Would've been a pleasure to meet you.
We saw the same guy out walking his dog, brown and white, each time we were outside taking a break. Maybe...
was the dog about a foot tall? And was the guy the only person in the place wearing a tie? If so... that was me! lol
